Class CoachUserEndpointTests

java.lang.Object
com.osoc6.OSOC6.BaseTestPerformer<T,I,R>
com.osoc6.OSOC6.TestFunctionProvider<UserEntity,Long,UserRepository>
com.osoc6.OSOC6.coachTest.CoachUserEndpointTests
@SpringBootTest @AutoConfigureMockMvc public final class CoachUserEndpointTests extends TestFunctionProvider<UserEntity,Long,UserRepository>
Class testing the integration of UserEntity as a coach.
